channel.title: sffa_community on Lemmy Community Directory
channel.description: Recent content in sffa_community on Lemmy Community Directory

item.title: Brandon Sanderson Fans
item.description: /c/Brandon Sanderson Fans on sffa.community https://dev.lemmy.sffa.community/c/brandonsanderson Description 1. Be kind. No hate, bigotry, rudeness, etc. will be tolerated. 2. Put the spoiler scope in your post title and follow the scope at all times. 3. No self promotion 4. Memes, merch photos, simple casting posts and AI images are disallowed except on Fridays to Sundays PST. Other low effort posts may also be removed under this rule. 5. No off-topic posts.

item.title: Cosmere
item.description: /c/Cosmere on sffa.community https://dev.lemmy.sffa.community/c/cosmere Description 1. Be kind. No hate, bigotry, rudeness, etc. will be tolerated. 2. Put the spoiler scope in your post title and follow the scope at all times. 3. No self promotion 4. Memes, merch photos, simple casting posts and AI images are disallowed except on Fridays PST. Other low effort posts may also be removed under this rule. 5. No off-topic posts. This includes real-world religious and political posts.

item.title: Cremposting
item.description: /c/Cremposting on sffa.community https://dev.lemmy.sffa.community/c/cremposting Description 1. Be kind. No hate, bigotry, rudeness, etc. will be tolerated. 2. Put the spoiler scope in your post title and follow the scope at all times. 3. No self promotion 4. Mark posts as [OC] if you made it or credit the maker if you know who it is. 5. No off-topic posts. This includes real-world religious and political posts. Please stick to Cosmere-related crem.

item.title: Fan-Fiction
item.description: /c/Fan-Fiction on sffa.community https://dev.lemmy.sffa.community/c/fanfic Description 1. Only post [OC] Fanfic. 2. You can post your story directly into a post, or link to an outside source where your story is hosted. 3. No NSFW, please use a different community for that. 4. Science Fiction or Fantasy genres are preferred but will not be strictly enforced. Be creative. 5. No snuff, hate, bigotry, etc. Your story can include strong themes or topics but they canâ€™t be directed at individuals or groups.

item.title: Imaginary Cosmere
item.description: /c/Imaginary Cosmere on sffa.community https://dev.lemmy.sffa.community/c/imaginarycosmere Description # Rules: 1. >No spoilers in post titles 2. >All posts must be [Tagged] for spoiler range. 3. >If an image itself is a blatant spoiler, mark NSFW so no thumbnail shows >People should be able to visit the subreddit without being spoiled straight away. 4. >If an image is NSFW it must be marked as NSFW and tagged with [NSFW] (as the flag may be used for spoilers)

item.title: Let's Talk About Books
item.description: /c/Let’s Talk About Books on sffa.community https://dev.lemmy.sffa.community/c/books Description 1. Be kind. No hate, bigotry, rudeness, etc. will be tolerated. 2. Put the spoiler scope in your post title and follow the scope at all times. 3. No self promotion 4. No off-topic posts. This includes real-world religious and political posts. Posts should related to books and reading, including recommendations, reviews, etc. 5. No Chat AI content. 6. No links to piracy websites or tools and no direct downloads to copyrighted material.

item.title: SFFA Meta
item.description: /c/SFFA Meta on sffa.community https://dev.lemmy.sffa.community/c/meta Description Talk to the admins of the SFFA community here! Have an idea for a new /c/ Community? make a post and offer to mod it and we will see if it fits our vibe. Please remember we are focused on fantasy and science-fiction properties. Details * Subscribers 4 Posts 2 Comments 0 Daily Active Users 1 Weekly Active Users 2 Monthly Active Users 2 Published 2023-06-14 23:32:59 Updated 2023-06-14 23:50:16 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:18

item.title: Short Stories
item.description: /c/Short Stories on sffa.community https://dev.lemmy.sffa.community/c/shortstories Description 1. Only post [OC] short stories. 2. You can post your story directly into a post, or link to an outside source where your story is hosted. 3. No NSFW, please use a different community for that. 4. Science Fiction or Fantasy genres are preferred but will not be strictly enforced. Be creative. 5. No snuff, hate, bigotry, etc. Your story can include strong themes or topics but they can't be directed at individuals or groups.
